cause.description:
What most people don’t know is that people are dying all over the world and we don’t do anything to help. We do send a little bit of food and water the most likely place but, what about the other places in the world, like china, Indonesia, South America. All countries have a rich and a poor side but know one knows that. People are dying each day and we only do a little bit to help. We (Canada) have so much to offer but we don’t and that makes me mad.
1. people the people
2. health care is a universal right
cause.name: help the dying people around the world
